meanings.definition: The state or quality of being single.
meanings.sent1: Her singlenesses allowed her to focus on her career.
meanings.sent2: The singlenesses of the apartment made it perfect for a solo dweller.
meanings.sent3: His multiple hobbies clashed with the singlenesses of his social life.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of loneliness through the singlenesses of the figure in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity and freedom of her singlenesses brought her peace.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unmarried or not in a relationship.
meanings.sent1: The singlenesses of her friends didn't bother her as she enjoyed her own company.
meanings.sent2: He embraced the singlenesses of his life and focused on personal growth.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously portrayed the struggles of singlenesses in a big city.
meanings.sent4: The song lyrics resonated with those who understood the singlenesses of heartbreak.
meanings.sent5: The character in the novel found solace in the singlenesses of her thoughts.
